description:
Takeru, the boy who Ageha has become friends with at the nursery school where she’s training, is moving away. Takeru is sad and doesn’t want to play with the other children, and Ageha doesn’t know what to do.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ageha Fails at Being the Best Nursery School Teacher?
あげは, 最強の保育士失格!?
